[close]

/rsc/js/tiny_mce/plugins/autocomplete/ -> plugin.src.js (source)

[Summary view] [Print] [Text view] 

   1  /**

   2   * editor_plugin_src.js

   3   * 

   4   * Copyright 2012, Mijura Pty. Ltd. Released under The MIT License.

   5   * 

   6   * About:

   7   * AutoComplete for TinyMCE provides inline autocomplete in a style similar to 

   8   * Twitter or Facebook.  The text you type in tinyMCE is checked 

   9   * against a list of specified options; if there is a match then 

  10   * you will see them appear in a list underneath the caret.  

  11   * 

  12   * Configuration:

  13   * Parameters that we can use in tinyMCE config:

  14   * 1\ autocomplete_delimiters - A CSV list of delimiters (ASCII codes) on which 

  15   *         to split text entered into tinyMCE. In most cases you will want to 

  16   *         split text by spaces, in which case you would specify '160,32'. 32 is 

  17   *         a normal space and 160 is &nbsp; (which is commonly used by tinyMCE). 

  18   *         Whichever delimiter you specify first will be inserted after you 

  19   *         select an option.  The default is '160,32' for spaces. 

  20   * 2\ autocomplete_options - A CSV list of autocomplete options.  For 

  21   *         example, 'john,jane,jwilliam'.    

  22   * 3\ autocomplete_trigger -  You can specify a trigger character that must 

  23   *         be type immediately before searching for options.  The default 

  24   *         trigger is '@'  

  25   * 4\ autocomplete_end_option - Any text that you want to be added after the 

  26   *         option.  The caret will be placed between the option and this ending 

  27   *         text.  For example, you could specify 'end', in which case selecting 

  28   *         an autocomplete option would insert: '@jane  @end' with the caret 

  29   *         placed in between (and including the trigger before the end option).

  30   * 5\ autocomplete_min_length - The minimum number of characters a word needs to have

  31   *              before the autocomplete activates.

  32   *              The default is 1.

  33   * 6\ autocomplete_min_length_ajax - The minimum number of characters a word needs to have

  34   *              before the autocomplete activates for AJAX request.

  35   *              The default is 4.

  36   * 7\ autocomplete_on_select - A function to call after an option is selected.

  37   *              The default is false.

  38   * 8\ autocomplete_on_match - A function to call when text entered match only one option.

  39   *              The default is false.

  40   *

  41   * Support: 

  42   * You are welcome to use this plugin at your own risk.  It is currently 

  43   * being maintained on GitHub where you can submit issues / feature requests. 

  44   *

  45   * Modified at 2014-02-06 to be compatible with TinyMCE 4 version

  46   */
  47  
  48  (function () {
  49      var autocomplete_data = {};
  50      var DOWN_ARROW_KEY = 40;
  51      var UP_ARROW_KEY = 38;
  52      var ESC_KEY = 27;
  53      var ENTER_KEY = 13;
  54      var END_WORD_KEYS = [32, 59, 186, 188, 190];
  55  
  56  	function parseOptions(param) {
  57          return param.options == null && typeof param != "boolean" ? param.split(",") : param.options;
  58      }
  59  
  60      tinymce.create('tinymce.plugins.AutoCompletePlugin', {
  61  
  62          setOptions: function (param) {
  63              autocomplete_data.options = parseOptions(param);
  64          },
  65  
  66          getOptions: function () {
  67              return autocomplete_data.options;
  68          },
  69  
  70          init: function (ed, url) {
  71  
  72              autocomplete_data = {
  73                  list: createOptionList(),
  74                  visible: false,
  75                  cancelEnter: false,
  76                  delimiter: ed.getParam('autocomplete_delimiters', '160,32').split(","),
  77                  options: parseOptions(ed.getParam('autocomplete_options', '')),
  78                  optionsUrl: parseOptions(ed.getParam('autocomplete_options_url', false)),
  79                  trigger: ed.getParam('autocomplete_trigger', '@'),
  80                  enclosing: ed.getParam('autocomplete_end_option', ''),
  81                  minLength: ed.getParam('autocomplete_min_length', '1'),
  82                  minLengthAjax: ed.getParam('autocomplete_min_length_ajax', '4'),
  83                  onSelect: ed.getParam('autocomplete_on_select', false),
  84                  onMatch: ed.getParam('autocomplete_on_match', false)
  85              };
  86  
  87              var t = this;
  88  
  89              // Setup plugin event

  90              if (autocomplete_data.onSelect) {
  91                  t.onSelect = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(t);
  92                  t.onSelect.add(function (ed, selected) {
  93                      ed.execCallback('autocomplete_on_select', ed, selected);
  94                  });
  95              }
  96              if (autocomplete_data.onMatch) {
  97                  t.onMatch = new tinymce.util.Dispatcher(t);
  98                  t.onMatch.add(function (ed, match) {
  99                      ed.execCallback('autocomplete_on_match', ed, match);
 100                  });
 101              }
 102  
 103              /**

 104               * Search for autocomplete options after text is entered and display the 

 105               * option list if any matches are found. 

 106               */
 107  			function keyUpEvent(e) {
 108                  if ((!autocomplete_data.visible && e.keyCode != ESC_KEY && e.keyCode != ENTER_KEY) || (e.keyCode != DOWN_ARROW_KEY && e.keyCode != UP_ARROW_KEY && e.keyCode != ENTER_KEY && e.keyCode != ESC_KEY)) {
 109                      var currentWord = getCurrentWord(ed);
 110                      currentWord = currentWord.replace(autocomplete_data.trigger, "");
 111                      var matches = matchingOptions(currentWord);
 112                      if (currentWord.length > 0) {
 113                          populateList(currentWord);
 114                      }
 115                      if (currentWord.length == 0 || matches.length == 0) {
 116                          hideOptionList();
 117                      }
 118                  }
 119              }
 120  
 121  
 122              /**

 123               * Populates autocomplete list with matched words.

 124               *

 125               */
 126  			function populateList(currentWord) {
 127                  var wordLessTrigger = currentWord.replace(autocomplete_data.trigger, "");
 128  
 129                  if( currentWord.length >= autocomplete_data.minLength &&
 130                      ( currentWord.length < autocomplete_data.minLengthAjax || ! autocomplete_data.optionsUrl ) )
 131                  { // Get matches from static array
 132                      matches = matchingOptions(wordLessTrigger);
 133  
 134                      if (matches.length > 0) {
 135                          displayOptionList(matches, wordLessTrigger, ed);
 136                          highlightNextOption();
 137                      }
 138                  }
 139                  else
 140                  { // Get matches by AJAX
 141                      if (wordLessTrigger.length <= 1)
 142                          return false;
 143  
 144                      var static_options = autocomplete_data.options;
 145                      jQuery.ajax({
 146                          type: "POST",
 147                          dataType: "JSON",
 148                          url: autocomplete_data.optionsUrl,
 149                          cache: false,
 150                          data: "q=" + wordLessTrigger,
 151                          success: function (data) {
 152                              if( data ) {
 153                                  var options = [];
 154                                  for( var i in data ) {
 155                                      options.push(data[i]);
 156                                  }
 157                                  autocomplete_data.options = options;
 158  
 159                                  matches = matchingOptions(wordLessTrigger);
 160  
 161                                  if (matches.length > 0) {
 162                                      displayOptionList(matches, wordLessTrigger, ed);
 163                                      highlightNextOption();
 164                                  }
 165                                  autocomplete_data.options = static_options;
 166                              }
 167                          }
 168                      });
 169                      autocomplete_data.options = static_options;
 170                  }
 171              } // populateList

 172  
 173  
 174              /**

 175               * Prevent return from adding a new line after selecting an option.  

 176               */
 177  			function keyPressEvent(e) {
 178                  if (e.keyCode == ENTER_KEY && autocomplete_data.cancelEnter) {
 179                      autocomplete_data.cancelEnter = false;
 180                      return tinymce.dom.Event.cancel(e);
 181                  }
 182              }
 183  
 184              /**

 185               * Handle navigation inside the option list when it is visible.  

 186               * These events should not propagate to the editor. 

 187               */
 188  			function keyDownEvent(e) {
 189                  if (autocomplete_data.visible) {
 190                      if (e.keyCode == DOWN_ARROW_KEY) {
 191                          highlightNextOption();
 192                          return tinymce.dom.Event.cancel(e);
 193                      }
 194                      if (e.keyCode == UP_ARROW_KEY) {
 195                          highlightPreviousOption();
 196                          return tinymce.dom.Event.cancel(e);
 197                      }
 198                      if (e.keyCode == ENTER_KEY) {
 199                          selectOption(ed, getCurrentWord(ed));
 200                          autocomplete_data.cancelEnter = true;
 201                          return false; // the enter evet needs to be cancelled on keypress so 

 202                          // it doesn't register a carriage return

 203                      }
 204                      if (e.keyCode == ESC_KEY) {
 205                          hideOptionList();
 206                          return tinymce.dom.Event.cancel(e);
 207                      }
 208                      // onMatch callback

 209                      if (autocomplete_data.onMatch && END_WORD_KEYS.indexOf(e.keyCode)) {
 210                          var word = getCurrentWord(ed);
 211                          var matches = matchingOptions(word);
 212                          var completeMatch = new RegExp("^" + matches[0] + "$", "i");
 213                          if (matches.length == 1 && word.match(completeMatch)) {
 214                              t.onMatch.dispatch(ed, matches[0]);
 215                          }
 216                      }
 217                  }
 218              }
 219  
 220  			function clickEvent(e) {
 221                  hideOptionList();
 222              }
 223  
 224              /**

 225               * Add all the options to the option list and display it right beneath 

 226               * the caret where the user is entering text. There didn't appear to be 

 227               * an easy way to retrieve the exact pixel position of the caret inside 

 228               * tinyMCE so the difficult method had to suffice. 

 229               */
 230  			function displayOptionList(matches, matchedText, ed) {
 231                  var matchesList = "";
 232                  var highlightRegex = new RegExp("(" + matchedText + ")");
 233  
 234  
 235                  for (var i in matches) {
 236                      if (matches[i].key != null) {
 237                          matchesList += "<li data-value='" + matches[i].key + "'>" + matches[i].key.replace(highlightRegex, "<mark>$1</mark>") + " " + matches[i].description + "</li>";
 238                      }
 239                      else if( typeof( matches[i] ) == 'string' ) {
 240                          matchesList += "<li data-value='" + matches[i] + "'>" + matches[i].replace(highlightRegex, "<mark>$1</mark>") + "</li>";
 241                      }
 242                  }
 243                  jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).html(matchesList);
 244  
 245                  // work out the position of the caret

 246                  var iframe_offset = jQuery( ed.getContainer() ).find( 'iframe' ).offset();
 247                  var textareaTop = 0;
 248                  var textareaLeft = 0;
 249                  if (ed.selection.getRng().getClientRects().length > 0) {
 250                      textareaTop = ed.selection.getRng().getClientRects()[0].top + ed.selection.getRng().getClientRects()[0].height;
 251                      textareaLeft = ed.selection.getRng().getClientRects()[0].left;
 252                  } else {
 253                      textareaTop = parseInt(jQuery(ed.selection.getNode()).css("font-size")) * 1.3 + nodePosition.top;
 254                      textareaLeft = nodePosition.left;
 255                  }
 256  
 257                  jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).css("position", "absolute");
 258                  jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).css("top", iframe_offset.top + textareaTop );
 259                  jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).css("left", iframe_offset.left + textareaLeft );
 260                  jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).css("display", "block");
 261                  autocomplete_data.visible = true;
 262                  optionListEventHandlers(ed);
 263              }
 264  
 265              /**

 266               * Allow a user to select an option by clicking with the mouse and 

 267               * highlighting the options on hover. 

 268               */
 269  			function optionListEventHandlers(ed) {
 270                  jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).find("li").hover(function () {
 271                      jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).find("[data-selected=true]").attr("data-selected", "false").removeClass( 'active' );
 272                      jQuery(this).attr("data-selected", "true").addClass( 'active' );
 273                  });
 274                  jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).find("li").click(function () {
 275                      selectOption(ed, getCurrentWord(ed));
 276                  });
 277              }
 278  
 279  			function createOptionList() {
 280                  var ulContainer = document.createElement("ul");
 281                  jQuery(ulContainer).addClass("textcomplete-list");
 282                  document.body.appendChild(ulContainer);
 283                  return ulContainer;
 284              }
 285  
 286  			function hideOptionList() {
 287                  jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).css("display", "none");
 288                  autocomplete_data.visible = false;
 289              }
 290  
 291  			function highlightNextOption() {
 292                  var current = jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).find("[data-selected=true]");
 293                  if (current.size() == 0 || current.next().size() == 0) {
 294                      jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).find("li:first-child").attr("data-selected", "true").addClass( 'active' );
 295                  } else {
 296                      current.next().attr("data-selected", "true").addClass( 'active' );
 297                  }
 298                  current.attr("data-selected", "false").removeClass( 'active' );
 299              }
 300  
 301  			function highlightPreviousOption() {
 302                  var current = jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).find("[data-selected=true]");
 303                  if (current.size() == 0 || current.prev().size() == 0) {
 304                      jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).find("li:last-child").attr("data-selected", "true").addClass( 'active' );
 305                  } else {
 306                      current.prev().attr("data-selected", "true").addClass( 'active' );
 307                  }
 308                  current.attr("data-selected", "false").removeClass( 'active' );
 309              }
 310  
 311              /**

 312               * Select/insert the currently selected option.  The option will be inserted at the 

 313               * caret position with a delimiter at the end and the option enclosing text.  If the 

 314               * enclosing text has already been inserted (this would happen when you are editing 

 315               * an autocompleted option), then it won't be inserted again. 

 316               */
 317  			function selectOption(ed, matchedText) {
 318                  var current = jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).find("[data-selected=true]").attr("data-value");
 319                  if (current == null) {
 320                      current = jQuery(autocomplete_data.list).find("li:first-child").attr("data-value");
 321                  }
 322  
 323                  var content = restOfContent(ed.selection.getSel().anchorNode, "");
 324                  var currentNode = ed.selection.getSel().anchorNode.textContent;
 325  
 326                  // modify the range to replace overwrite the option text that has already been entered

 327                  var range = ed.selection.getRng();
 328                  range.setStart(range.startContainer, range.startOffset - matchedText.length);
 329                  ed.selection.setRng(range);
 330  
 331                  // insert the trigger, selected option and following delimiter 

 332                  var delim = "";
 333                  if (autocomplete_data.delimiter.length > 0) {
 334                      delim = String.fromCharCode(autocomplete_data.delimiter[0]);
 335                  }
 336                  ed.selection.setContent(autocomplete_data.trigger + current.toString() + delim);
 337  
 338                  // insert the enclosing text if it has not already been added

 339                  if (autocomplete_data.enclosing.length > 0 && !closingTextExists(content, currentNode)) {
 340                      var middleBookmark = ed.selection.getBookmark();
 341                      ed.selection.setContent(delim + autocomplete_data.trigger + autocomplete_data.enclosing);
 342                      ed.selection.moveToBookmark(middleBookmark);
 343                  }
 344                  hideOptionList();
 345  
 346                  // onSelect callback

 347                  if (autocomplete_data.onSelect) {
 348                      t.onSelect.dispatch(ed, current);
 349                  }
 350                  hideOptionList();
 351              }
 352  
 353              /**

 354               * Check if the enclosing string has already been placed past the current node.  

 355               */
 356  			function closingTextExists(content, currentNode) {
 357                  var enclosed = autocomplete_data.trigger + autocomplete_data.enclosing;
 358                  content = content.substr(currentNode.length);
 359                  var matches = new RegExp(autocomplete_data.trigger + ".{" + autocomplete_data.enclosing.length + "}", "g").exec(content);
 360                  if (matches != null && matches.length > 0 && matches[0] == enclosed) {
 361                      return true;
 362                  }
 363                  return false;
 364              }
 365  
 366              /**

 367               * Recursively find all of the content past (and including) the caret node. 

 368               * This doesn't appear to be available any other way.  

 369               */
 370  			function restOfContent(anchorNode, content) {
 371                  content += anchorNode.textContent;
 372                  if (anchorNode.nextSibling != null) {
 373                      return restOfContent(anchorNode.nextSibling, content);
 374                  }
 375                  return content;
 376              }
 377  
 378              /**

 379               * Find all options whose beginning matches the currently entered text. 

 380               */
 381  			function matchingOptions(currentWord) {
 382                  var options = autocomplete_data.options;
 383                  var matches = [];
 384                  for (var i in options) {
 385                      if (options[i].key == null && (currentWord.length == 0 || beginningOfWordMatches(currentWord, options[i]))) {
 386                          matches.push(options[i]);
 387                      }
 388                      else if (options[i].key != null && (currentWord.length == 0 || beginningOfWordMatches(currentWord, options[i].key))) {
 389                          matches.push(options[i]);
 390                      }
 391                  }
 392                  return matches;
 393              }
 394  
 395  			function beginningOfWordMatches(beginning, option) {
 396                  var test = new RegExp("^" + beginning, "i");
 397                  return (typeof( option ) == 'string' ? option.match(test) : '');
 398              }
 399  
 400              /**

 401               * Retrieves the 'word' as specified by the first occurrence of a

 402               * delimiter prior to the caret position.

 403               */
 404  			function getCurrentWord(ed) {
 405                  var nodeText = ed.selection.getSel().focusNode == null ? "" : ed.selection.getSel().focusNode.nodeValue;
 406                  var positionInNode = ed.selection.getSel().focusOffset;
 407                  if (nodeText == null || nodeText.length == 0) {
 408                      return "";
 409                  }
 410                  var lastDelimiter = 0;
 411                  for (var i = 0; i < positionInNode; i++) {
 412                      if (autocomplete_data.delimiter.indexOf(nodeText.charCodeAt(i).toString()) != -1) {
 413                          lastDelimiter = i + 1;
 414                      }
 415                  }
 416                  var word = nodeText.substr(lastDelimiter, positionInNode - lastDelimiter);
 417                  var retWord = "";
 418                  if (autocomplete_data.trigger == '') {
 419                      if (word.length >= autocomplete_data.minLength) {
 420                          retWord = word;
 421                      }
 422                  } else {
 423                      if (word.length > autocomplete_data.minLength && word.charAt(0).toString() == autocomplete_data.trigger) {
 424                          retWord = word;
 425                      }
 426                  }
 427                  return retWord;
 428              }
 429  
 430              ed.on( 'keyup', keyUpEvent );
 431              ed.on( 'keydown' , keyDownEvent );
 432              ed.on( 'keypress', keyPressEvent );
 433              ed.on( 'click', clickEvent );
 434          },
 435  
 436          getInfo: function () {
 437              return {
 438                  longname: 'AutoComplete',
 439                  author: 'Mijura Pty Ltd',
 440                  authorurl: 'http://mijura.com',
 441                  infourl: 'http://blog.mijura.com',
 442                  version: tinymce.majorVersion + "." + tinymce.minorVersion
 443              };
 444          }
 445      });
 446  
 447      tinymce.PluginManager.add('autocomplete',
 448              tinymce.plugins.AutoCompletePlugin);
 449  })();
